overview_of_class:
R is open source statistical system that has become the lingua franca of statistical data analysis. R is both a statistical system for processing data using traditional and modern statistics and a programming language for developing new methods. This course will introduce you to R with an emphasis in using R for psychological research. Time will be spent using standard R packages for data analysis including regression, factor analysis, test construction, and multilevel modeling. Students will be introduced to the fundamentals of programming in R and will be shown how to modify existing packages to be more useful for their own work.

No prior experience in programming is required, although a willingness to learn is essential.
name: Special Topics in Psychology
title: WCAS PSYCH 314-0-20 Special Topics in Psychology
topic: An Introduction to R Programming for Psychologists
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Psychology students.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
R is open source statistical system that has become the lingua franca of statistical data analysis. R is both a statistical system for processing data using traditional and modern statistics and a programming language for developing new methods. This course will introduce you to R with an emphasis in using R for psychological research. Time will be spent using standard R packages for data analysis including regression, factor analysis, test construction, and multilevel modeling. Students will be introduced to the fundamentals of programming in R and will be shown how to modify existing packages to be more useful for their own work.

No prior experience in programming is required, although a willingness to learn is essential.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Students will be expected to do basic data analysis in R and to write short programs to facilitate their analyses.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Class participation, Homework, Online work, Paper: mid-term, Presentations, Project: final, Research project

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Although no textbooks will be assigned, text books available for download from the R project will be used.

subject: PSYCH
